document.full_text: russian president dmitry medvedev took aim at prime minister vladimir putin's new "all-russian people's front" thursday, saying no party can consider itself dominant by default and vowing to ensure political competition.
document.title: russia's medvedev takes aim at new putin movement
lines_and_colors: russian president dmitry medvedev took aim at prime minister vladimir putin's new "all-russian people's front" thursday, saying no party can consider itself dominant by default and vowing to ensure political competition.
